duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a team of managers responsible for broadcast operations of content creation and delivery systems.
Develop and publish process documentation related to the ECC job responsibilities including incident ticket handling and emergency and business continuity operations.
Conduct weekly ticket reviews and training for the ECC and other teams.
Manage a unified calendar of broadcast operations events and important change management events.
Ensure accurate channel configuration and contact details.

education_certification.credential: 8 or more years experience in operations or master control supervision at a major market NOC facility or broadcast network.
